0: This is followed by a long wait at the lobby with rooms not readyWe found the room to be very dusty
Free WiFi should be offered in rooms
Even once you have a connection the speed is often not fast enough to view websites

When you 1st book a room with Atlantis they charge a deposit Guarantee of 1 night then on arrival the remaining nights are charged but as a deposit upon checking the final bill none of this shows and you are left with a total bill which confuses you into think Am i paying again
The property is aging and most furniture pieces are worn out and dated
Finally out of 15 rooms the bell boys got us luggage of only 2 rooms rest 13 rooms had their luggage on their own
We stayed in the imperial club suites which include most food and even alcohol for some hours of the day so if you plan your day right you should not have to spend anything
Our cleaner Kalyan did a great job at servicing our room
After complaining they were moved to another room in the East Tower much later that day
We are regular customers coming every year but the room given this time was really poor standard
1: Rooms are excellent with great views
It was my fiancé ’s birthday whilst we were there and they had a birthday cake delivered to the room
The room was perfectly clean and cosy
You can also dial reception for baby milk which was delivered free of charge to the room
A nice view Atlantis the palm
I kept all my valuables in my room including my wallet and went down with just my key card
amazing rooms with a beautiful view of the palm
Fantastic hotel has to be seen to be believed was on the bucket list ca n’t fault the hotel everything was perfect the rooms
